title: Anyone else getting Frame Drops?
body:
In the last month games are having frame drops (where the game freezes for a second or so)

This was not an issue a month ago and others say they get it too in game.  

Just wondering if its a chipset or if it is more systemic.

replies.body:
> Just wondering if its a chipset or if it is more systemic.

I dont think that means what you think it means.

From what i have seen, a small percentage of systems experience a bug that lowers FPS, but since people always want to bitch about it instead of supply system specifications and running software, it remains unidentified.

* OS version

* GPU (speed, temperature, driver version)

* CPU (speed, temps, thread usage)

* RAM configuration (and usage)

* All running software, even background

* Any other issues with the system?

It could also just be an issue with your computer specifically.
